name: Chateau de Jonvilliers Bed & Breakfast

reviews.text: I would like to second the other reviewer from June, 2007. Their more lengthy review is absolutely accurate. Richard and Virginie were wonderful hosts. We will definitely stay here again if we are in this neighborhood.
reviews.title: Charming place

reviews.text: We stayed 3 nights in late May, and loved it. Our hosts, Richard and Virginie were wonderful....very friendly and helpful. It was a
reviews.title: Charming!

likes.disliked: — climbing 3 floors with my suitcase-but would do it again!

reviews.text: pleasure to chat with them each morning at breakfsat. And, speaking of breakfast...what a fabulous array of food. Each morning Virginie made something special. One morning was
reviews.title: Comfortable, Excellent Value and Personable Hosts

reviews.text: crepes, still warm, one morning was apple bread pudding...along with all the things that were there every morning...homemade yogurt, 3 kinds of fresh granola, several kinds of breads, homemade jams.....all delicious!
reviews.title: Lovely country setting; wonderful hosts

aka: Chateau De Jonvilliers Bed & Breakfast France/Ecrosnes
description: Located not far from Chartres and half an hour from Versailles, the Château de Jonvilliers is home to two spacious and quiet, self-catering cottages. Nestled in 35 acres of woods and gardens, the cottages sleep six and seven respectively.
